full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement (Expired)
================================	Message has been removed as expired

### Contract Reference and Publications
---------------------------------------------

* **Contract Reference:** WS3981426483 – Doc4063293933
* **Publication Date:** June 20, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** July 5, 2023, 14:00:00 (EDT)
* **Amendment Date:** June 27, 2023

### Contract Description and Specifications
-----------------------------------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the provision of structural firefighting and rescue services. The contractor must provide all labour, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision necessary to respond to emergency calls at the 15 Wing Moose Jaw site in Saskatchewan.

### Contract Requirements
-------------------------

* Provide structural firefighting and rescue services
* Respond to emergency calls at the 15 Wing Moose Jaw site
* Labour, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision are required

### Contact Information
-----------------------

For any inquiries or questions regarding this tender, please contact:

* **Contact Name:** Ruwani (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** [ruwani.wall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ruwani.wall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16639526?extsite=MTY2Mzk1MjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16639526?extsite=MTY2Mzk1MjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Trade Agreements
---------------------

The following trade agreements apply to this tender:

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPT
